attributes.action: MPs Fact Finding Missions to be Financed by MPs
attributes.additional_details:
I/We would like all fact finding missions abroad to be paid by the MPs and Civil servant's attending the trip, they should pay all the cost if not at least half the cost as they earn enough money.

The country cant afford all these so called fact finding missions and we need to put  a stop to these un necessary trips.

This should also include County councillors and Local Councils as they also waste the tax payers money on these so called fact finding trips.
